text: intak kur'anaiyum, itarku munnullataiyum niccayamaka nankal nampamattom" enru kahpiranavarkal kurukirarkal inta aniyayak kararkal tankal iraivanitam niruttappatum potu nir parppiranal avarkalil cilar cilar mitu peccait tiruppi palahinarkalakak karutappattavarkal perumaiyait tetik kontiruntorai nokki, "ninkal illatiruppin, niccayamaka nankal muhminkalakiyiruppom" enru kuruvarkal
